test.create_query: CREATE TABLE optimized_select_final (t DateTime, x Int32) ENGINE = ReplacingMergeTree() PARTITION BY toYYYYMM(t) ORDER BY x
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO optimized_select_final SELECT toDate('2000-01-01'), number FROM numbers(5000000)
INSERT INTO optimized_select_final SELECT toDate('2020-01-01'), number FROM numbers(5000000)
INSERT INTO optimized_select_final SELECT toDate('2021-01-01'), number FROM numbers(5000000)
INSERT INTO optimized_select_final SELECT toDate('2022-01-01'), number FROM numbers(5000000)
test.query: SELECT * FROM optimized_select_final FINAL FORMAT Null
